import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

source.648e9465:
#visualize correlation of each variable using pearson correlation
sns.heatmap(df.corr(), vmax = 0.9, linewidths = 1.5, cmap = 'viridis')
plt.title('Pearson Correlation', fontsize = 15, pad = 12, color = 'r')
plt.show()
source.98ff3897:
#visualize car source 1
chart = df['car_source_1'].value_counts().sort_values(ascending = False).plot(kind = 'bar', color = 'salmon')
chart.set_xticklabels(chart.get_xticklabels(), rotation = 45)
plt.title('First Car Source', fontsize = 15, pad = 12, color = 'b')
plt.xlabel('First Car Source', fontsize = 12)
plt.ylabel('Count', fontsize = 12)
plt.show()
source.b72ef7b2:
#visualize car source 2
chart = df['car_source_2'].value_counts().sort_values(ascending = False).plot(kind = 'bar', color = 'darkorange')
chart.set_xticklabels(chart.get_xticklabels(), rotation = 45)
plt.title('Second Car Source', fontsize = 15, pad = 12, color = 'b')
plt.xlabel('Second Car Source', fontsize = 12)
plt.ylabel('Count', fontsize = 12)
plt.show()
source.b9f3d537:
#visualize stock specs
plt.figure(figsize = (6,5))
stock_specs = [np.count_nonzero(df[df['stock_specs'] == 'S1']),
             np.count_nonzero(df[df['stock_specs'] == 'S2']),
             np.count_nonzero(df[df['stock_specs'] == 'A']),
             np.count_nonzero(df[df['stock_specs'] == 'B']),
             np.count_nonzero(df[df['stock_specs'] == 'C'])]
activities = ['S1', 'S2', 'A', 'B', 'C']
plt.pie(stock_specs, labels = activities, autopct = '%1.f%%')
plt.title('Stock Specs', fontsize = 15, color = 'maroon')
plt.show()
source.7f202d45:
#visualize driver type
chart = df['Drive_Type'].value_counts().sort_values(ascending = False).plot(kind = 'bar', color = 'gold')
chart.set_xticklabels(chart.get_xticklabels(), rotation = 45)
plt.title('Driver Type', fontsize = 15, pad = 12, color = 'b')
plt.xlabel('Driver Type', fontsize = 12)
plt.ylabel('Count', fontsize = 12)
plt.show()
